src:
AP NewsAlert
05 Nov 2019, 21:07 by EndPlay
NEW ROADS, La. - NEW ROADS, La. (AP) - Louisiana governor's office says novelist Ernest J. Gaines, who wrote about black struggles, has died at age 86.
